title: New Client
body: Anyone have game issues since the update?? ive had 2 games since the update and refusing to play ranked because i keep DCing ( never had it happen before ever) and my teams dont deserve it but has anyone else had any problems gamewise since it released?

replies.body: thanks heaps guys was hoping it wasnt just me :)....
Seems to be a current issue right now, looks like Riot is looking into fixing it, I would hold off from playing any games in the mean time.
Tbh it' been like this since the new client came out for me
I honestly avoid ranked for 2-3 days after patch. its seems to break something more often then not.
